text: It would have been helpful if the authors presented models that flexibly control for trends. It's also important to note that the buprenorphine fill days outcome is not affected by expansion. That suggests Medicaid increased number of people in tx but decreased length of tx.

metadata.raw_text: It would have been helpful if the authors presented models that flexibly control for trends. It's also important to note that the buprenorphine fill days outcome is not affected by expansion. That suggests Medicaid increased number of people in tx but decreased length of tx.

text: It's also important to note that buprenorphine fill rates were rising in expansion counties and falling in non-expansion counties even before 2014. Authors fail to reject these slopes were statistically different, but that doesn't mean we should ignore what our eyes can see.
